thread.title: 13-Year-Old Girl BRUTALIZES Alt-Right Troll While Defending Patton Oswalt On Twitter!
thread.title_full: 13-Year-Old Girl BRUTALIZES Alt-Right Troll While Defending Patton Oswalt On Twitter!

author: Perez Hilton
title: 13-Year-Old Girl BRUTALIZES Alt-Right Troll While Defending Patton Oswalt On Twitter!
text:
Usually Patton Oswalt fights his own fights on Twitter . 
After all, we're talking about one of the most brilliant comic minds alive. 
But when some alt-right troll called a joke about his deceased wife Michelle McNamara "hilarious" there was no need for the comedian to put up his social media dukes. 
Because a 13-year-old girl with osteogenesis imperfecta smacked down the anonymous douche for him! 
See Patton's reaction (below)! 
An anonymous, alt-right beta is being owned in this thread by Kylee, a 13 year-old girl. Bliss. https://t.co/kkijxI8VBD — Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) February 1, 2017 
Wait, what?? 
Let's rewind a second. This all started when Patton got into a Twitter row with some asshole tweeting about his late wife: 
Would've happily ignored Tony Brust if he hadn't sent THIS Tweet. But he did and it caught me at a dark moment: pic.twitter.com/yflAMuSAqo — Patton Oswalt (@pattonoswalt) January 31, 2017 
After that explanation of how the feud got started, any reasonable person would understand why the comic couldn't leave it alone. 
But some troll hiding behind the name @hansolo prodded Patton by calling the joke "hilarious." 
That's when wheelchair-bound heroine Kylee Koenig came in. Here is their amazingly one-sided war of words: 
AH-Mazing!
